headline: Liberis and Elavon Partner to Unlock Fast Funding for Small Businesses in the United States
summary: ATLANTA & LONDON, August 26, 2025--Liberis (Liberis US Inc.), a leading global embedded finance platform, today announced a new partnership with Elavon, a leading payments provider and subsidiary of U.S. Bank (NYSE: USB), to launch Quick Capital, a seamless funding solution for small businesses across the United States.
